TestGroupDocumentation.Title: maxInclusive5 GetSet Tree Content tests
TestGroupDocumentation.Description: The tests for checking the content of trees got by unmarshalling of the maxInclusive-5.xsd based XML documents and created dynamically via ObjectFactory. The schema defines a short restricted SimpleType with maxInclusive value 32767. Various XML documents specify various values in the element.

TestCaseDocumentation.Title: NIST XML short maxInclusive-5.xsd, unmarshalled content tree GetSet test
TestCaseDocumentation.Description: The test unmarshalls maxInclusive-5-1.xml,...,maxInclusive-5-5.xml documents which specify the values -32768, -6283, -28943, -30275, 32767 for the short restricted SimpleType NISTSchema-short-maxInclusive-5 element and expects that elemObj.getValue() returns specified in xml value, then invokes elemObj.setValue(short), elemObj.getValue() should return set value.

TestCaseDocumentation.Title: NIST XML short maxInclusive-5.xsd GetSet test for dynamically created content tree
TestCaseDocumentation.Description: The test creates an instance of short restricted SimpleType NISTSchema-short-maxInclusive-5 type with the values -32768, -6283, -28943, -30275, 32767 and expects that elemObj.getValue() returns specified values, then invokes elemObj.setValue(short) with various values, elemObj.getValue() should return set values.
